com.bandyer.core_av.view

Class StreamView

  • com.bandyer.core_av.view.StreamView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BandyerView, VideoStreamView

    public class StreamView

    Abstract view which extends FrameLayout and is used to render the stream of the subscriber and publisher

    • Constructor Summary

      • setMirror

        public void setMirror(boolean enable)

        Method used to enable mirroring of the video stream.

        You may want to enable it for local video, to display a more natural image.

        Parameters:
        enable - true to enable false to disable
